Não há muito o que fazer com este prédio, mas você pode usar a Força nas janelas e portas para obter uma pequena quantidade de studs. Certifique-se de destruir as janelas gradeadas amarelas no lado direito do prédio.
LEGO City cont.
Construa uma casa em miniatura
Você pode usar a Força em várias partes desta casa para revelar peças de LEGO.








Use a Força em todas as partes da casa e, em seguida, destrua o pilar para revelar as peças finais. Construa-as em uma casa em miniatura.







Revele uma casa escondida
Há uma fundação de casa cercada por árvores. Simplesmente destrua todas as árvores para revelar a casa!







Construa e pilote um ATV
Ao se aproximar desta casa, ela flutuará para longe, revelando um objeto prateado.








Destrua-o para revelar uma pilha de peças de LEGO que você pode construir em um ATV.








Depois de construído, suba nele e siga a trilha de pinos. Esta trilha de pinos só será visível enquanto você estiver pilotando o ATV.







Liberte alguns prisioneiros
Esses caras não são prisioneiros propriamente ditos, mas estão presos atrás desta barreira. Use um detonador térmico ou o AT-ST para destruí-la.






Soletre "LEGO"
Há muitos blocos neste canto da área. Você tem que fazê-los soletrar "LEGO".








Você ganhará studs por completar cada letra e ganhará mais pinos quando a palavra inteira for soletrada.







Assim que você coletar 1 milhão de studs, o nível terminará e seu melhor tempo será registrado. Infelizmente, você não consegue manter esses 1 milhão de studs. Se você fez tudo nesta lista e ainda não tem 1 milhão de studs, corra por aí e certifique-se de ter derrotado os inimigos e atirado e destruído tudo. Eu geralmente perco a destruição de uma porta ou planta em algum lugar. Os droides GNK também podem ser destruídos com um combo perfeito de sabre de luz.
New Town
Em um universo infinito, todas as coisas são possíveis.

A luta épica da família Skywalker envia turbulência por toda a Força.

E em OUTRA galáxia muito, muito distante, porém, ecos desse drama vivem, e um novo mundo desperta....

Este nível bônus pode ser desbloqueado após coletar 50 Tijolos de Ouro. É o seu nível padrão de coletar 1 milhão de studs. Embora você seja cronometrado, não há limite de tempo.

Há muitas coisas que você pode fazer para coletar 1 milhão de studs. As coisas mais básicas que você pode fazer são simples: atirar, construir e usar a Força em tudo o que puder. Existem vários cidadãos andando por aí que podem ser derrotados. Existem pilhas de sementes que você pode plantar no chão. Existem janelas e portas para usar a Força. Há também coisas mais "complicadas" que você pode fazer por studs. Vou explicar abaixo.

Revelar 19 flores
Bem ao lado do seu ponto de partida há uma igreja. Há um campo ao lado dela. Caminhe pelo campo e você revelará algumas flores escondidas.






Há 19 flores para revelar. Uma vez que as flores tenham sido reveladas, você terá que esperar alguns segundos pelos studs.







Reparar o campanário
As peças de LEGO para o campanário estão ao lado da igreja. Use a Força para colocá-las na posição, depois puxe a alavanca para tocar o sino.






Destruir uma casa
Esta casa pode simplesmente ser destruída.









Enviar o carrossel para o espaço
Há um playground no canto direito da área. Além de balanços e um escorregador, você pode encontrar um carrossel.







Destrua o objeto prateado para revelar peças de LEGO, depois construa-as em uma manivela rotatória. Gire-a para lançar o carrossel para o espaço!






Pegar um barco na água
Siga a trilha de studs perto do seu ponto de partida e você chegará a um barco. Construa as peças de LEGO no barco e, em seguida, empurre-o para a água.






Entre no barco e colete os studs na água. Os studs só serão visíveis quando você estiver no barco.







Eliminar os patos
Há alguns patos nadando em círculos na água. Você pode atirar neles para obter studs.








Construir um caminhão de leite
Esta casa com azulejos na lateral esconde as peças para um caminhão de leite.








Destrua as latas de lixo ao redor para revelar as peças de LEGO para um caminhão de leite.








Usar a Força em um troféu escondido
Esta casa com um telhado preto pode ser destruída para revelar um grande troféu.








Use a Força nele várias vezes para coletar muitos studs.








Construir um trator
Esta pequena casa pode ser destruída para revelar peças de LEGO.








Você pode construí-las em um trator.









Restaurar a energia
Existem dois moinhos de vento quebrados com peças de LEGO ao lado deles. Use a Força nas peças de LEGO nos moinhos de vento para consertá-los.






Isso acenderá as luzes da quadra de basquete, permitindo que você as destrua.








Resgatar um gato
Há um caminhão de bombeiros estacionado do lado de fora do corpo de bombeiros. Entre e siga a trilha de studs.







Quando você chegar perto da igreja, o caminhão será estacionado automaticamente. Use a Força na escada ao lado da igreja.







Use o gancho para derrubar o gato do campanário.








Montar um Tauntaun
Há alguns Tauntauns relaxando em um cercado. Monte em um e siga a trilha de studs. Esta trilha de studs só será visível enquanto estiver montando o Tauntaun.






Andar de montanha-russa
Há uma manivela rotatória próximo a alguns trilhos. Gire-a para mover o carrinho ao longo dos trilhos.







Rapidamente, monte em um Tauntaun próximo e impulsione-se até o carrinho. Espere alguns segundos e o carrinho se moverá para a outra extremidade dos trilhos, permitindo que você colete os studs.





Revelar uma casa escondida
A fundação de uma casa está cercada por árvores. Destrua as árvores para revelar a casa.
New Town cont.
Construa uma casa em miniatura
Force cada seção desta casa para revelar peças de LEGO. Destrua o pilar para revelar o conjunto final de peças e, em seguida, construa-as em uma casa em miniatura.






Construa um ATV
Uma das casas flutuará quando você se aproximar dela. Dentro há um objeto prateado. Destrua-o para revelar peças de LEGO, que você pode construir em um ATV.






Arremesse na cesta
Entre na torre na quadra de basquete e use-a para lançar bolas de basquete na cesta até acertar uma.







Soletre LEGO
Existem vários blocos espalhados na parte superior da área. Force-os para formar letras.








Inicialmente, essas letras soletrarão GOLE. Force um conjunto de letras e seu parceiro forçará o outro. Isso soletrará LEGO e lhe renderá uma grande quantidade de studs.






Assim que você coletar 1 milhão de studs, o nível terminará e seu melhor tempo será registrado. Infelizmente, você não consegue manter esses 1 milhão de studs. Se você fez tudo nesta lista e ainda não tem 1 milhão de studs, corra por aí e certifique-se de ter derrotado os inimigos e atirado e destruído tudo. Normalmente, eu perco a destruição de uma porta ou planta em algum lugar. Os droides GNK também podem ser destruídos com um combo perfeito de sabre de luz.
---------Bounty Hunter Missions---------
Mission 1 - Qui-Gon Jinn
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme.

Their first target: the Jedi Qui-Gon Jinn, currently engaged in a secret mission above the planet Naboo.

Level: Negotiations

Head down the hallway and it will turn to the right. At the intersection you'll find a Protocol panel on the left side of the hallway.







Use it to open the door. Head inside and you'll find Qui-Gon on the right.
Mission 2 - Queen Amidala
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Now the royal leader of Naboo has become a target of the Hutt's evil ambition.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme, and capture Queen Amidala.

Level: Escape from Naboo

Head to the left and shoot the glass dome to destroy it, revealing an opening. Drop down and head to the right. Go up the stairs and you'll find a grapple point.






Use it to reach the ledge above you, then look to the right to find another ledge.








Hover over to the ledge to find Queen Amidala.
Mission 3 - Jar Jar Binks
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

For once, though, Jabba's information is faulty.

On the planet Naboo, he has sent his Bounty Hunters to find and capture the utterly inconsequential Gungan, Jar Jar Binks.

Level: Invasion of Naboo

Head up the path to the right and a ramp will be lowered, allowing you to proceed. Continue to the right into the swamp, where you'll find a crashed MTT.






Destroy the silver turret on it to destroy it, clearing the path.








Head into the alcove and you'll find Jar Jar standing on the left side.
Mission 4 - Mace Windu
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Even the noble Jedi have become targets of the Hutt's evil ambition.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: Mace Windu, currently on Geonosis...

Level: Droid Factory

Head to the right and you'll see some tan pillars. Destroy them to create an opening, then head inside.







Head to the right and you'll find an Astromech panel.








Use it to lower some of the force fields in the room. Head to the left and you'll run into Mace Windu.
Mission 5 - Kit Fisto
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Even the noble Jedi have become targets of the Hutt's evil ambition.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: Kit Fisto, currently on Kamino....

Level: Discovery on Kamino

Head to the left and you'll see Kit Fisto on a platform. Simply hover over to reach him.
Mission 6 - Luminara
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Even the noble Jedi have become targets of the Hutt's evil ambition.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: Luminara Unduli, in the Geonosian battle arena...

Level: Jedi Battle

Head to the right and you'll find Luminara trapped in a cage. Use the Bounty Hunter panel to open the cage, allowing you to capture her.
Mission 7 - Ki-Adi Mundi
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Even the noble Jedi have become targets of the Hutt's evil ambition.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: Ki-Adi Mundi, commanding a Republic Attack Cruiser....

Level: Chancellor in Peril

Head down the hallway and you'll notice a droideka guarding a doorway.








Destroy the droideka (toss a thermal detonator at it), then destroy the silver box to lower a ramp, allowing you to enter the next area.







In the next area, head to the far left to find this Jedi Master.
Mission 8 - Rebel Trooper
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

The greedy mercenaries know no limits in their pursuit of bounty.

On the planet Kashyyyk, they will even pursue a lone Rebel Trooper far away from home.

Level: Defense of Kashyyyk

You'll start this mission in the village. Shoot the two boxes to your right to lower the bridge, then continue to the right.







You'll reach the clearing where the clones normally are, where you'll find another bridge.








Shoot the two boxes to lower the bridge, allowing you to continue on. If you look towards the background, you'll actually see your quarry on a platform on the tree.






To reach him, head towards the tree and you'll find a grapple point.








Use it to reach the platform above you. Hop across to the left, then use the grapple points to reach the ledge where you rescue the first Wookiee.







Look to the left and you'll see another platform.









Hover over to it, then hover onto the next platform on the left. Use the grapple point to reach the platform with your target.
Mission 9 - Shaak Ti
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Even the noble Jedi have become targets of the Hutt's evil ambition.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: Shaak Ti, in the Jedi Temple...

Level: Ruin of the Jedi

Head to the right and you can see Shaak Ti way up on a ledge above the temple entrance.








To reach her, destroy this node on the far right side of the area to reveal a grapple point.








Use it to reach the upper ledge, then hop up the ledges to the left to reach Shaak Ti.
Mission 10 - Commander Cody
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme.

On the planet Utapau, Commander Cody's high status in the Republic military will make him a valuable prize...

Level: General Grievous

Look to the left and you'll see a platform. Hop onto it and onto the ledge on the left, where you'll find a silver wall.







Destroy it and you'll find Cody on the ledge behind it.
Mission 11 - R2-D2
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Naturally, the evil Hutt intends to take the ransom money, trade his prisoners to the Imperials regardless, and pocket a double bounty.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their first target, R2-D2, a lowly droid made valuable by the secret information he contains high above Tatooine on the Rebel Blockade Runner....

Level: Secret Plans

Use the grapple point on the ground floor to reach the next ledge, then head to the left. Use the grapple point to reach the upper ledge.







You'll find two piles of LEGO pieces, so build them into generators.








This will extend the bridge, so cross it and head through the opening at the other end.








Head down the hallway in this next area and take a right to find a Bounty Hunter panel. Use it to open the door, then head inside.







Head down the hallway and you'll find two grey panels. Stand near them and they will raise up, revealing LEGO pieces.







Build them into a door, which will open up, revealing R2.
Mission 12 - Obi-Wan Kenobi
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Naturally, the evil Hutt intends to take the ransom money, trade his prisoners to the Imperials regardless, and pocket a double bounty.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: the legendary Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi, now an old man hidden somewhere on the planet Tatooine....

Level: Through the Jundland Wastes

You'll start this mission off inside the Sandcrawler. Watch out for the Jawas, as they'll try to zap IG-88 and 4-LOM. Head down the hallway and use the Astromech panel at the end to open the elevator. Head inside.





In the next area, quickly step on each set of four buttons to reveal levers. Pull one and your partner will pull the other, opening the gate. Head into the next area.






Head to the left and use the Protocol panel to open the door.








Head through the opening and go to the right, where you'll find Obi-Wan behind glass. Destroy the nodes to destroy the glass, allowing you to collect him.
Mission 13 - Chewbacca
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Naturally, the evil Hutt intends to take the ransom money, trade his prisoners to the Imperials regardless, and pocket a double bounty.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: the courageous Wookiee Chewbacca, last seen in the shady alleys of Mos Eisley Spaceport...

Level: Mos Eisley Spaceport

Head to the right and use the grapple point to reach the ledge. Don't bother building the LEGO pieces, just head through the opening.







Head down the path and through the open door.









Head to the left in the next area and you'll find a bunch of doors.








Destroy the doors on the left to reveal Chewbacca.
Mission 14 - Princess Leia
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Naturally, the evil Hutt intends to take the ransom money, trade his prisoners to the Imperials regardless, and pocket a double bounty.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: the Alderaan Senator Princess Leia, currently a guest of Darth Vader on the mighty Death Star battle station....

Level: Rescue the Princess

Head to the right and hover across the gap. You can build the LEGO pieces into a rotary handle and use it to rotate the bridge, but it isn't necessary since you have Boba Fett.






Use the grapple point to reach the next ledge, then hover across to the right and head through the door.







Head all the way to the end of the path in the next area, then head inside the elevator at the end.








Build the LEGO pieces into consoles, powering up the levers. Pull one and your partner will pull the other, opening the door to the cellblock.







Head down the hall and pull the levers in the back left to open the cell.








Head inside to find Princess Leia.
Mission 15 - Admiral Ackbar
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Naturally, the evil Hutt intends to take the ransom money, trade his prisoners to the Imperials regardless, and pocket a double bounty.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: the Rebel Commander Admiral Ackbar, stationed on the Rebel base of Hoth....

Level: Escape from Echo Base

Head to the left and you'll find a Protocol panel. Use it to open the door, then head inside.








Inside, you'll find some silver rubble on the left. Destroy it to clear the path, then head inside the alcove.







The door on the right is locked and won't open. To open the door, destroy the box on the left.








Once the door is open, head into the next room, where you'll find Ackbar in the bacta tank. Build the LEGO pieces into a console, draining the bacta tank and allowing you to collect Ackbar.
Mission 16 - Yoda
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Naturally, the evil Hutt intends to take the ransom money, trade his prisoners to the Imperials regardless, and pocket a double bounty.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: Yoda, a Jedi Master forced into hiding when the Republic collapsed, recently spotted on the forest moon of Endor....

Level: The Battle of Endor

Head to the left and you'll find some LEGO pieces. Build them into gears, which will raise up the bridge.







Continue all the way to the left, where you'll find two purple boxes. Destroy them to reveal LEGO pieces.








Build them into a rotary handle, then turn it to raise up the platform on the tree across the gap.








Hover over to the platform to be raised up onto the ledge with Yoda.
Mission 17 - C-3PO
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Naturally, the evil Hutt intends to take the ransom money, trade his prisoners to the Imperials regardless, and pocket a double bounty.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: a humble protocol droid whose knowledge of Rebel personnel makes him a valuable asset - C-3PO, last seen in Cloud City....

Level: Betrayal over Bespin

Head down the hallway and up the stairs. Continue down the path and you'll see a Bounty Hunter panel. Use it to open the door.







Head straight ahead and you'll find a Protocol panel. Use it to open the door, then continue down the hallway.







Head into the elevator on the left and you'll find a Bounty Hunter panel.








Use it to power the elevator, taking you to the rooftop where 3PO is.
Mission 18 - Lando Calrissian
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Naturally, the evil Hutt intends to take the ransom money, trade his prisoners to the Imperials regardless, and pocket a double bounty.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: Lando Calrissian, the Baron-Administrator of Cloud City, with known Rebel sympathies....

Level: Betrayal over Bespin

Head onto the landing pad and build the LEGO pieces into a grapple point. Use it to reach the opposite ledge, then grapple up and continue to the right.






Use the Protocol panel to open the door, then head down the hallway.








Head through the gas to reach the room with the levers you pull to raise the bridge to the Falcon.








You'll find Lando standing in this room.
Mission 19 - Luke Skywalker
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Naturally, the evil Hutt intends to take the ransom money, trade his prisoners to the Imperials regardless, and pocket a double bounty.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their next target: Luke Skywalker, the great Jedi hero of the Alliance, last seen in the shady alleys of Mos Eisley Spaceport....

Level: Mos Eisley Spaceport

Head to the left and you'll see a silver node.









Destroy it to reveal LEGO pieces, then build them into a rotary handle. Turn it to slowly move the gear in front of you to the right.







Once the gear is in position, LEGO pieces will fall from the sky. Build them into a grapple point, then use it to reach Luke.
Mission 20 - Han Solo
The vile gangster Jabba the Hutt plans to kidnap leading figures across the galaxy, threatening to hand them over to Imperial forces unless a ransom is paid.

Naturally, the evil Hutt intends to take the ransom money, trade his prisoners to the Imperials regardless, and pocket a double bounty.

A band of vicious Bounty Hunters has come together to execute Jabba's scheme. Their final target: Han Solo, a former smuggler turned Alliance hero, stationed on the Rebel base of Hoth....

Level: Escape from Echo Base

Head to the right and the door will be blocked off by a rock slide. Build the LEGO pieces that appeared into a bomb, which will explode and clear the doorway.






Continue down the hall and the next door will be iced over. Build the LEGO pieces into a heater, then shoot it a few times to turn it on, melting the ice. Head through the opening.






In the next room, head to the right and push the heater onto the red slot on the tiles. This will melt the ice over the door. Head into the next hallway.







Head down the hallway and turn to the right to find a bunch of crates. Destroy them all to clear the way into the next room, then head inside.







Build the LEGO pieces onto the cart and it will start moving around the track. Don't turn the rotary handle though.







Instead, hop on top of the cart and you'll see Han on a ledge on the right. Use the cart as a boost to reach the ledge, allowing you to collect Han.
--------------Miscellaneous--------------
100% Completion Bonus
After collecting all 160 Gold Bricks, return to the Courtyard outside the Cantina. You'll notice a whole bunch of gold LEGO pieces.







You can build the LEGO pieces into a stud fountain. Once it is built, all Extras will be unlocked and purchased (if you haven't unlocked and purchased them all already)!






At this point, studs will begin to fly out of the stud fountain. This is a great way to get studs if you still have things that you need to purchase from the Bar.






You can check out your percentage to the left of the Bar. Once you reach 100%, you will receive a special message!







A message will appear at the bottom of the screen alerting you that the Character Customizer now holds the key to Super Jedi Powers! What does this mean? It means that custom characters you create will have every ability in the game! If it's listed in the "Character Abilities" section of this guide, they can do it! This allows you to replay levels entirely as your custom characters, so have fun with it!
Characters
There are a grand total of 126 characters (not including the 2 custom characters) that you can play as in this game. I have listed them all below in the order that they appear on the character selection screen. Next to each character I list their weapon and abilities. I also list how to unlock them and any other interesting things about them. I have also linked each character to their Wookiepedia page. If you would like to learn more about a character, simply click on their name to be taken to Wookiepedia.












Qui-Gon Jinn[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Lightsaber
Abilities: Double Jump, Force
How To Unlock: Create a new game





Obi-Wan Kenobi[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Lightsaber
Abilities: Double Jump, Force
How To Unlock: Create a new game





TC-14[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: None
Abilities: Protocol
How To Unlock: Complete Negotiations

Being a droid, TC-14 will not be targeted by enemies



Jar Jar Binks[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: None
Abilities: High Jump
How To Unlock: Complete Invasion of Naboo





Queen Amidala[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster, Melee
Abilities: Grapple, Sharp Shoot
How To Unlock: Complete Escape from Naboo





Captain Panaka[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster, Melee
Abilities: Grapple, Sharp Shoot
How To Unlock: Complete Escape from Naboo





Padme (Battle)[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster, Melee
Abilities: Grapple, Sharp Shoot
How To Unlock: Complete Retake Theed Palace





R2-D2[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Zapper
Abilities: Astromech, Hover
How To Unlock: Complete either Retake Theed Palace, Droid Factory, Chancellor in Peril, Secret Plans, Dagobah, or Jabba's Palace

Being a droid, R2-D2 will not be targeted by enemies

Anakin Skywalker (Boy)[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: None
Abilities: Small
How To Unlock: Complete Retake Theed Palace





Obi-Wan Kenobi (Jedi Master)[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Lightsaber
Abilities: Double Jump, Force
How To Unlock: Complete Discovery on Kamino





R4-P17[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Zapper
Abilities: Astromech, Hover
How To Unlock: Complete Discovery on Kamino

Being a droid, R4-P17 will not be targeted by enemies



Anakin Skywalker (Padawan)[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Lightsaber
Abilities: Double Jump, Force
How To Unlock: Complete Droid Factory

One of the things I like about this character is that his lightsaber color changes in the story like it does in Episode II. He will have a blue lightsaber in Droid Factory and a green lightsaber Jedi Battle and Count Dooku. When you play as him in any other mode however, his lightsaber will be blue.

Padme (Geonosis)[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster, Melee
Abilities: Grapple, Sharp Shoot
How To Unlock: Complete Droid Factory





C-3PO[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: None
Abilities: Protocol
How To Unlock: Complete either Droid Factory, Secret Plans, Escape from Echo Base or Jabba's Palace

Being a droid, C-3PO will not be targeted by enemies

Mace Windu[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Lightsaber
Abilities: Double Jump, Force
How To Unlock: Complete Jedi Battle





Padme (Clawed)[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster, Melee
Abilities: Grapple, Sharp Shoot
How To Unlock: Complete Jedi Battle





Yoda[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Lightsaber
Abilities: Double Jump, Force
How To Unlock: Complete either Jedi Battle, Defense of Kashyyyk or Dagobah

Despite being small, Yoda cannot crawl through travel chutes. He also will move at a snail's pace when his lightsaber is not ignited, so I suggest you keep it ignited at all times.

Obi-Wan Kenobi (Episode III)[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Lightsaber
Abilities: Double Jump, Force
How To Unlock: Complete Chancellor in Peril

Weapon: Lightsaber
Abilities: Double Jump, Force
How To Unlock: Complete Chancellor in Peril

Abilities: Grapple, Imperial, Sharp Shoot

Chewbacca[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Bowcaster, Melee
Abilities: Grapple, Sharp Shoot
How To Unlock: Complete either Defense of Kashyyyk, Mos Eisley Spaceport, Escape from Echo Base or Jabba's Palace

If you melee attack a trooper, Chewbacca will rip their arms off, instantly defeating them! This also works for troopers that normally take two hits to defeat!

Weapon: Spear
Abilities: High Jump
How To Unlock: Complete Invasion of Naboo, then purchase at the Bar

Captain Tarpals can deflect blasts using his shield. Hold the "attack" button to deflect blasts. However, you can't deflect them back at attackers.

Weapon: Axe
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Jabba's Palace, then purchase at the Bar

The Gamorrean Guard can deflect blaster bolts with his axe, but only when standing still. Unfortunately, he can't send bolts back at attackers

Abilities: Bounty Hunter, Grapple, Hover, Sharp Shoot, Thermal Detonator

Boba Fett has an extremely powerful blaster. Each bolt does two hits of damage to enemies!

Weapon: Slingshot
Abilities: Sharp Shoot, Small
How To Unlock: Complete The Battle of Endor, then purchase at the Bar




Imperial Guard[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Force Pike
Abilities: Imperial
How To Unlock: Complete Jedi Destiny, then purchase at the Bar

Imperial Guards can deflect blasts with their weapon. However, they cannot deflect bolts back at attackers

The Emperor[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Lightsaber
Abilities: Double Jump, Imperial, Sith Force
How To Unlock: Complete Jedi Destiny, then purchase at the Bar




Admiral Ackbar[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster
Abilities: Double Jump, Grapple, Sharp Shoot
How To Unlock: Complete Into the Death Star, then purchase at the Bar

Ackbar doesn't have a traditional double jump. His dive roll is very high, so he can reach some higher ledges that other blaster characters cannot
Characters cont.

Abilities: Astromech, Bounty Hunter, Grapple, Protocol, Sharp Shoot, Thermal Detonator

Abilities: Bounty Hunter, Grapple, Sharp Shoot, Thermal Detonator
How To Unlock: Complete all Story levels, then purchase at the Bar



4-LOM[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster, Melee
Abilities: Astromech, Bounty Hunter, Grapple, Protocol, Sharp Shoot, Thermal Detonator
How To Unlock: Complete all Story levels, then purchase at the Bar

4-LOM has an extremely powerful blaster. Each bolt does two hits of damage to enemies!

Ben Kenobi (Ghost)[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Lightsaber
Abilities: Double Jump, Force
How To Unlock: Complete all Story levels, then purchase at the Bar

Being a ghost, Ben Kenobi will not be targeted by enemies!

Anakin Skywalker (Ghost)[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Lightsaber
Abilities: Double Jump, Force
How To Unlock: Complete all Story levels, then purchase at the Bar

Being a ghost, Anakin will not be targeted by enemies!

Yoda (Ghost)[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Lightsaber
Abilities: Double Jump, Force
How To Unlock: Complete all Story levels, then purchase at the Bar

Being a ghost, Yoda will not be targeted by enemies! He also moves at a snail's pace if his lightsaber is not ignited.

R2-Q5[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Zapper
Abilities: Astromech, Hover
How To Unlock: Complete all Story levels, then purchase at the Bar

Being a droid, R2-Q5 will not be targeted by enemies

Indiana Jones[indianajones.fandom.com]

Weapon: Gun, Melee
Abilities: Grapple, Sharp Shoot
How To Unlock: Watch the trailer for LEGO Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures (see the Tour of Chalmun's Cantina section)
Extra Toggle Characters
While playing certain modes and levels with Extra Toggle turned on, you will have access to several new characters. You can only play as these characters in the levels/modes they are available in, and you cannot bring them into the Cantina or any other levels/modes. Similar to the Characters section, I will list their weapons/abilities if they have any, as well as the levels/modes you can play them in. I have also provided links to a character's Wookieepedia page if applicable.

Rancor[starwars.fandom.com]
Weapon: None
Abilities: None
Levels Available: Episode I Minikit Bonus




Wampa[starwars.fandom.com]
Weapon: None
Abilities: None
Levels Available: Episode V Minikit Bonus




Skeleton

Weapon: Melee
Abilities: None
Levels Available: Jedi Battle, Ruin of the Jedi, Through the Jundland Wastes, Rescue the Princess, Escape from Echo Base, Dagobah, The Great Pit of Carkoon, The Battle of Endor, Jedi Destiny

Buzz Droid[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Melee
Abilities: None
Levels Available: Battle over Coruscant, Chancellor in Peril, General Grievous, Episode III Character Bonus








Training Remote[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster (does no damage)
Abilities: None
Levels Available: Ruin of the Jedi

Rebel Engineer

Weapon: Blaster, Melee
Abilities: Grapple, Sharp Shoot
Levels Available: Secret Plans, Escape from Echo Base, A New Hope









Droid 1[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster
Abilities: Sharp Shoot
Levels Available: Through the Jundland Wastes, Mos Eisley Spaceport, Episode IV Character Bonus















Droid 2[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster
Abilities: Sharp Shoot
Levels Available: Through the Jundland Wastes, Mos Eisley Spaceport, Episode IV Character Bonus








Droid 3[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster
Abilities: Sharp Shoot
Levels Available: Through the Jundland Wastes, Mos Eisley Spaceport, Episode IV Character Bonus







Droid 4[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster
Abilities: Sharp Shoot
Levels Available: Through the Jundland Wastes, Mos Eisley Spaceport, Episode IV Character Bonus










Womp Rat[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: None
Abilities: None
Levels Available: Through the Jundland Wastes, Mos Eisley Spaceport, Jabba's Palace, The Battle of Endor, Episode IV Character Bonus, LEGO City, New Town



Mouse Droid[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: None
Abilities: None
Levels Available: Rescue the Princess, Death Star Escape, Jedi Destiny

Imperial Engineer

Weapon: Blaster
Abilities: Grapple, Imperial, Sharp Shoot
Levels Available: Rescue the Princess, Death Star Escape, The Battle of Endor, Jedi Destiny, Episode VI Character Bonus














AT-AT Driver[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster
Abilities: Grapple, Imperial, Sharp Shoot
Levels Available: Escape from Echo Base, Speeder Showdown









Han Solo (frozen in carbonite)[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: None
Abilities: None
Levels Available: Cloud City Trap, Betrayal over Bespin, Jabba's Palace, Episode V Character Bonus








Scout Trooper[starwars.fandom.com]

Weapon: Blaster
Abilities: Grapple, Imperial, Sharp Shoot
Levels Available: Speeder Showdown, The Battle of Endor
Vehicles
There are a grand total of 21 vehicles that you can play as in this game. I have listed them all below in the order that they appear on the vehicle selection screen. Next to each vehicle I list their abilities. I also list how to unlock them and any other interesting things about them. I have also linked each vehicle to their Wookiepedia page. If you would like to learn more about a vehicle, simply click on their name to be taken to Wookiepedia.


















Anakin's Pod[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Mos Espa Pod Race











Naboo Starfighter[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Anakin's Flight











Anakin's Speeder[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Bounty Hunter Pursuit











Republic Gunship[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: Tow Cable
How To Unlock: Complete Gunship Cavalry











Jedi Starfighter (Yellow)[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Battle over Coruscant











Jedi Starfighter (Red)[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Battle over Coruscant











X-wing[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete either Rebel Attack or Falcon Flight











Y-wing[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Rebel Attack

Since Y-wings are bombers, they are capable of holding up to 5 torpedoes at once








Snowspeeder[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: Tow Cable
How To Unlock: Complete Hoth Battle











Millenium Falcon[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete either Falcon Flight or Into the Death Star










Sebulba's Pod[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Mos Espa Pod Race, then purchase at the Bar










Zam's Airspeeder[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Bounty Hunter Pursuit, then purchase at the Bar










Droid Trifighter[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Battle over Coruscant, then purchase at the Bar










Vulture Droid[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Battle over Coruscant, then purchase at the Bar










Clone Arcfighter[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Battle over Coruscant, then purchase at the Bar










TIE Fighter[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: TIE
How To Unlock: Complete Rebel Attack, then purchase at the Bar










TIE Interceptor[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: TIE
How To Unlock: Complete Rebel Attack, then purchase at the Bar










TIE Fighter (Darth Vader)[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: TIE
How To Unlock: Complete Rebel Attack, then purchase at the Bar










TIE Bomber[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: TIE
How To Unlock: Complete Falcon Flight, then purchase at the Bar

Since this is a bomber, this ship can hold up to 5 torpedoes at once







Imperial Shuttle[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete Into the Death Star, then purchase at the Bar










Slave 1[starwars.fandom.com]
Abilities: None
How To Unlock: Complete all Minikit Models
Minikit Models
There are a total of 36 minikit models in the game. Completing a minikit model will unlock it for use in the Minikit Bonuses. You cannot play a Minikit Bonus until you have at least 1 completed Minikit Model. You can also view the Minikit Models in the Courtyard.





































Red Power Brick Extras
There are a total of 45 Extras available in this game. The first is unlocked automatically, and there are 8 more for purchase at the Bar. The other 36 you'll have to unlock by collecting the Red Power Bricks in the Story levels. Below I've listed each Extra in the order they appear in the menu. I have also listed what they do, and how to unlock them.

Adaptive Difficulty
How To Unlock: Create a new game
What It Does: This Extra is always on by default. With Adaptive Difficulty on, you will lose different amounts of studs depending on how often you die. If you die a lot, you will only lose 1,000 studs. If you don't die very often, you'll lose 4,000 studs. With Adaptive Difficulty off, you'll lose 2,000 studs every time you die, regardless of how often it is.

Extra Toggle
How To Unlock: Create a new game, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: While playing certain levels in Free Play Mode, you will have a few extra characters available to play as. Check out the "Extra Toggle Characters" section for more info.





Fertilizer
How To Unlock: Create a new game, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: While riding animals (such as a Bantha or Dewback), press the "special" button and the animal will poop!






Disguises
How To Unlock: Create a new game, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This will give all characters a fake nose and mustache







Daisy chains
How To Unlock: Create a new game, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This turns the grappling wire into a chain of flowers







Chewbacca carrying C-3PO
How To Unlock: Create a new game, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This simply makes Chewbacca look like he did in Cloud City in The Empire Strikes Back, with 3PO's parts on his back






Tow Death Star
How To Unlock: Create a new game, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This turns all of the bombs you tow into mini Death Stars.







Silhouettes
How To Unlock: Create a new game, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This turns all characters into black silhouettes







Beep Beep
How To Unlock: Create a new game, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: Pressing the "attack" button in any vehicle without weapons will cause it to honk its horn!






Super Gonk
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Negotiations, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: Gonk droids are normally very slow walkers. With this Extra active, they'll be turned into speed demons and are now able to jump





Poo Money
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Invasion of Naboo, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: If you have this Extra active, hop on an animal and press the "special" button to make the animal poop studs! This only works if you also have the Fertilizer extra active.




Walkie talkie disable
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Escape from Naboo, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: Press the "special" button while controlling a character with a walkie talkie (Battle Droid (Commander) or Imperial Spy) to use it. This will shut down all nearby droids temporarily!




Power Brick detector
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Mos Espa Pod Race, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: While playing a level, an arrow will be pointing towards the location of the Power Brick. This will not tell you how to collect it. It only shows you where it will appear.




Super slap
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Retake Theed Palace, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This doubles the power of melee attacks, causing them to do two hits of damage.





Force grapple leap
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Darth Maul, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This allows Jedi and Sith characters to use grapple points.






Stud Magnet
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Bounty Hunter Pursuit, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This increases the range at which you can pick up studs. This only really works on studs that have "settled" on the ground, not ones that are still bouncing.




Disarm troopers
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Discovery on Kamino, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This turns the weapons of all non-droid enemies into carrots, making them unable to shoot at you! Be careful, as this also affects you and your characters. If you want to play as a Clone Trooper but have this extra turned on, you will also have a carrot as a weapon.



Character studs
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Droid Factory, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: When enemies are defeated, they will drop a small amount of studs.





Perfect deflect
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Jedi Battle, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: With this turned on, any blaster bolts you deflect will be sent straight back to the attacker.





Exploding blaster bolts
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Gunship Cavalry, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This causes blaster bolts to explode when they hit something. This makes them capable of destroying silver objects, but they will sometimes still bounce off them. If you are controlling a vehicle, this extra enables you to destroy torpedo targets or things that you would normally need to tow a bomb into. I recommend keeping this turned off unless you have Invincibility, as the explosions will damage you too.

Force pull
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Count Dooku, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: When using the Force on a droid, you will pull it towards you, instantly destroying it.





Vehicle smart bomb
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Battle over Coruscant, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: While playing as a vehicle, hold down the "special" button. After a few seconds, all enemies on the screen will explode!
Red Power Brick Extras cont.
Super astromech
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Chancellor in Peril, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: Zapping a droid will stun it, as well as up to four other nearby droids. If you have the "Super Zapper" Extra active, it will negate the effect of this Extra.




Super Jedi slam
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in General Grievous, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This increases the area of effect of the Jedi Slam, and causes it to pretty much instantly defeat everyone caught in it (except bosses).




Super thermal detonator
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Defense of Kashyyyk, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This increases the area of effect of thermal detonators.






Deflect bolts
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Ruin of the Jedi, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This causes blaster bolts to simply bounce off of you, even if you don't have a lightsaber or are not actively deflecting. If you have "Perfect deflect" active, they'll be sent back at the attacker.




Dark Side
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Darth Vader, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This gives all Jedi the Sith Force ability. It also turns your lightsaber red (this color change will override the color change of "Super Lightsabers").




Super blasters
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Secret Plans, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This doubles the power of all blaster bolts, causing them to do two hits of damage. This also works for Boba Fett and 4-LOM, who will now do four hits of damage with their blasters.




Fast Force
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Through the Jundland Wastes, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This increases the speed at which you Force objects and enemies.





Super lightsabers
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Mos Eisley Spaceport, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This increases the power of lightsabers, causing them to do two hits of damage. It will also turn them purple (unless you also have Dark Side active).




Tractor beam
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Rescue the Princess, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: When playing as a vehicle, enemies that fly close to you will be slowly pulled towards you and then destroyed. While they are caught in the tractor beam, enemies are unable to attack you.




Invincibility
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Death Star Escape, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This makes you immune to damage from all sources.






Score x2
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Rebel Attack, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: Multiplies the value of all studs collected by two. This stacks with all other stud multipliers.





Self destruct
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Hoth Battle, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: Press the "special" button while controlling any droid character and they will explode! This allows them to destroy silver objects. Pressing the "special" button to activate an Astromech or Protocol panel will not cause an explosion.



Fast build
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Escape from Echo Base, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This increases the speed at which you build LEGO pieces.






Score x4
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Falcon Flight, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: Multiplies the value of all studs collected by four. This stacks with all other stud multipliers.





Regenerate hearts
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Dagobah, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: If you have any hearts missing, you will slowly regenerate them.





Minikit detector
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Betrayal over Bespin, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: Arrows will point you to the locations of Canisters in Story levels. This will not show you how to collect them, as the arrows only point to where the Canister will appear.




Score x6
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Cloud City Trap, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: Multiplies the value of all studs collected by six. This stacks with all other stud multipliers.





Super zapper
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Jabba's Palace, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: This actually turns the zapper into a useful weapon. It will destroy all droids in one shot, and can even be used to temporarily stun non-droid enemies.




Bounty hunter rockets
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in The Great Pit of Carkoon, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: Press the "tag" button as Boba or Jango Fett and you'll launch a rocket, which will home in on enemies or silver objects.





Score x8
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Speeder Showdown, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: Multiplies the value of all studs collected by eight. This stacks with all other stud multipliers.





Super Ewok catapult
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in The Battle of Endor, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: The image for this is misleading, as this actually causes the slingshots used by Wicket and the Ewok to fire proton torpedoes. This makes them capable of destroying silver objects.




Infinite torpedoes
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Into the Death Star, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: While playing as a vehicle, you will always have the maximum amount of torpedoes that it can carry.





Score x10
How To Unlock: Collect the Red Power Brick in Jedi Destiny, then purchase at the Bar
What It Does: Multiplies the value of all studs collected by ten. This stacks with all other stud multipliers.
Cheat Codes
This is a list of the Cheat Codes available to use in the game. As mentioned in the "Tour of Chalmun's Cantina" section, these Cheat Codes can be entered in the "Enter Code" section of the Bar. Inputting a Cheat Code for a Character/Vehicle will unlock it for purchase. Inputting a Cheat Code for an Extra unlocks it automatically (you won't have to pay studs for it).

I have personally checked all of these codes and I can vouch for their authenticity. If you have any other Cheat Codes that you wish to share, please message me and I will check them. If they work, I will add them to this list and give credit to you.

Characters

Unicórnio Dourado
Brilhe, unicórnio dourado, brilhe!
Prêmios concedem 800 Pontos Steam aos criadores. Concedido por 3 pessoas.
Picante
Às vezes precisa daquele tempero a mais, sabe?
Prêmios concedem 400 Pontos Steam aos criadores. Concedido por 1 pessoa.
Poesia

Prêmios concedem 100 Pontos Steam aos criadores. Concedido por 6 pessoas.
